title: Ed Davey – 2022 Comments on Government’s Emergency Statement
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Ed Davey, the Leader of the Liberal Democrats, on Twitter on 17 October 2022.
content:
So much damage has already been done by these reckless Tories.
  *[ISIL]: Islamic State of Iraq and the Levant
  *[SDGs]: Sustainable Development Goals
  *[IMF]: International Monetary Fund
  *[UN]: United Nations
  *[GDP]: Gross Domestic Product

Now they will slash spending on our NHS and schools, while propping up bankers’ bonuses to keep their donors happy.
  *[ISIL]: Islamic State of Iraq and the Levant
  *[SDGs]: Sustainable Development Goals
  *[IMF]: International Monetary Fund
  *[UN]: United Nations
  *[GDP]: Gross Domestic Product

General Election NOW.
  *[ISIL]: Islamic State of Iraq and the Levant
  *[SDGs]: Sustainable Development Goals
  *[IMF]: International Monetary Fund
  *[UN]: United Nations
  *[GDP]: Gross Domestic Product
